Gogoat

Type HP Attack Defense Speed Special Attack Special Defense Total
123 100 62 68 97 81 531
#208 0' 6.8"
200.62 lbs. 		Mount Pokémon It can tell how its trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathetic sense lets them run as if one being. They inhabit mountainous regions.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Sap Sipper 3 Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
10 Cud Chew 5 An eaten Berry will be regurgitated at the end of the next turn and eaten again.
25 Grass Pelt 2 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Grassy Terrain.
40 Own Tempo 2 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
55 Serene Grace 5 Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.
70 Leaf Guard 2 Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
85 Simple 5 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
100 Ripen 5 Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 03 Own Tempo 2 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 0 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 12 Sturdy 3 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 18 Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Disc 21 Rock Head 3 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Disc 50 Oblivious 2 The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from being infatuated or taunted.
Disc 55 Regenerator 5 Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Adaptability 15 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Chlorolize 15 Normal-type moves become Grass-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Chlorophyll 5 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Cud Chew 5 An eaten Berry will be regurgitated at the end of the next turn and eaten again.
Defeatist -10 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Effect Spore 2 Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
Fluffy 5 Halves the damage taken from contact moves, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
Grass Pelt 2 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Grassy Terrain.
Harvest 5 May create another Berry after one is used.
Klutz -4 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Leaf Guard 2 Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
Natural Cure 3 All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
Overcoat 2 Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
Overgrow 3 Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Pickup 1 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Ripen 5 Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.
Run Away 0 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Sap Sipper 3 Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move instead of taking damage.
Serene Grace 5 Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring when attacking.
Simple 5 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Slow Start -3 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Solar Power 5 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight or solar wind, but HP decreases every turn.
Stall -3 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Grassy Surge 16 Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Guard Dog 3 Boosts Attack if intimidated. Effects that force switching out also fail to work against it.
Sheer Force 15 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
